title: Is Virgin Mary in the bible & Mariam in the Quran the same person? - assim al hakeem
transcript: in regards to imagine's first question is Virgin Mary in the Bible the same as Maryam the mother of Aisha the answer is yes she's the same person and is the same person who had the miraculous birth of Issa or Jesus peace be upon him and she's the same one now whether some details May differ in her life and in the life of Maryam this is probable but it doesn't make them two different people
